cause.description:
Help provide spiritual and material goods for the poor across the world. Catholic World Mission does everything from build chapels to feed children. CWM supports Catholic schools, lay missionaries, medical missions and humanitarian relief efforts of local dioceses and parishes.
Catholic World Mission receives private funds and foundation grants for its work. For more information go to:
http://www.catholicworldmission.org
1. Fulfillment of the human person is only found in Christ. The opportunity must be provided.
2. More prosperous nations are obliged to share their resources with the needy.
cause.mission: Provide for the poor all around the world as we spread the gospel.
cause.name: Catholic World Mission
